FuncDef:
The pki ocsp response cache enable command enables a device to cache OCSP responses.
The undo pki ocsp response cache enable command disables a device from caching OCSP responses. The pki ocsp response cache enable command enables a device to cache OCSP responses. The undo pki ocsp response cache enable command disables a device from caching OCSP responses. By default, the PKI OCSP response cache function is disabled.
CLIs: undo pki ocsp response cache enable
